event.description: Aaron Barbosa grounds out, pitcher Jon Lester to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Tucker Roeder strikes out swinging.
Matt Miller flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Jonathan Leroux flies out to left fielder Cody Ross.
Pete Castoldi singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Jason Roth called out on strikes and Pete Castoldi caught stealing 2nd, catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia to shortstop Jose Iglesias.
Defensive Substitution: Kelly Shoppach replaces catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Justin Germano replaces Jon Lester.
Ricky Salvucci singles on a fly ball to left fielder Cody Ross.
Oliver Hart pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Connor Lyons grounds out, pitcher Justin Germano to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Ricky Salvucci to 2nd.
Aaron Barbosa grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pedro Ciriaco remains in the game as the shortstop.

Oscar Tejeda remains in the game as the second baseman.
Nate Spears remains in the game as the first baseman.
